article_title: Indiana's Republican Senate race mirrors national party divisions

og.description: The civil war between "establishment" and "outsider" candidates that's tearing apart the national Republican Party has a Hoosier parallel in the primary election to succeed retiring U.S. Sen. Dan Coats,
